author: The Editorial Board
title: Erdogan’s American Hostage
text:
Turkish strongman Recep Tayyip Erdogan has imprisoned opponents and moved the country toward authoritarian rule. That’s the political context through which to understand the trial of American pastor Andrew Brunson.
The 50-year-old evangelical Christian appeared in court in Aliaga Monday on charges that he aided groups that tried to overthrow Mr. Erdogan’s government in a 2016 coup. The indictment reads like a series of conspiracy theories and is based on evidence from secret witnesses that would be laughed out of an American...
